thread.title: Richard Grenell Obliterates Misleading Headline From “The Hill” About Hispanics Being Deported
thread.title_full: Richard Grenell Obliterates Misleading Headline From “The Hill” About Hispanics Being Deported

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Richard Grenell Obliterates Misleading Headline From “The Hill” About Hispanics Being Deported
text:
09:44pm February 13, 2017   
If you aren’t following Richard Grenell on Twitter yet then there is something seriously wrong with you. 
The former US diplomat delivers sharp and hilarious posts on a daily basis. 
His latest victim was The Hill who thought it would be a good idea to run one of the most misleading headlines you’ll ever see. 
Check it out… 
— The Hill (@thehill) February 11, 2017 
I’m sorry, what? 
Grenell was all over it. Shameful & irresponsible headline. Only illegal immigrants get deported. Stop purposefully confusing the issue. https://t.co/haKwkk6wwG 
— Richard Grenell (@RichardGrenell) February 12, 2017 
Exactly. 
Why in the world would someone who isn’t an illegal immigrant care about this? 
If you are a Hispanic who is in this country legally then the only reason you’d be afraid is because of misleading media narratives like this. 
Looks like some other people agree with that. @thehill not this Hispanic or in my family because parents came here legally so no not all Hispanics 
— Karina n Taylor (@KarinanTaylor23) February 12, 2017 @thehill Hispanics? I'm not worried because I'm legal and Hispanic. What is wrong with you guys.
